import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { call, location, mail, globe, chevronBack, ellipsisVerticalOutline} from 'ionicons/icons' import { IonContent, IonHeader, IonPage, IonTitle, IonToolbar, IonCard, IonItem, IonCardContent, IonIcon, IonButtons, IonBackButton, IonButton, IonPopover } from '@ionic/react'; import './Contact.css'; const Contact: React.FC = () => { const [showPopover, setShowPopover] = useState(false); return ( Contact setShowPopover(true)}> setShowPopover(false)}> Notifications
Search
Rate Now
Share Now

USA Call

sales@frankallart.co.uk

USA Email

Sales@frankallart.com

UK Address

15/35 Great Tindal Street,Birmingham,B16 8DR UK

USA Address

25 Sylvan Road South,Suite N,Westport,CT 06880 USA

Website

www.frankallart.co.uk

 ); }; export default Contact;
